name: CASE: Online
description:
Case: Online is a Fan game of CASE 2: Animatronics Survival. Which continues the Multiplayer Mode.

You can Play Up to 8 Players. 2 Animatronics and 6 Survivors.

As an Animatronic, it's Job to Kill Anyone and do not let Anyone Escape. Communicate with your Animatronic friend.

As a Survivor, You need to Escape the Place. Use Your EMP and Tasers to Protect Yourself. Repair Generators to Proceed, Collect Items. (or dance)
